hotels.title: Five-Star Maldives Banyan Tree Retreat with PADI Dive Centre & House Reef
hotels.description: Castaway to paradise with a five-star stay at Banyan Tree Vabbinfaru, a secluded Maldives island retreat surrounded by snow-white sands and the endless blue beyond. Just a 20-minute catamaran ride from Mal√©'s airport, this intimate resort includes an abundance of top-notch facilities - enjoy beachside dining at Ilaafathi and Naiboli Bar, explore vast underwater kingdoms with the on-site PADI Dive Centre or head to celebrated Banyan Tree Spa for soul-soothing treatments.
